title: Legal Aid Check Financial Eligibility create dependant payload schema
description: This schema defines the payload required to create one or more define vehicles owned by the applicant for the Legal Aid Check Financial Eligibility API

value.description: The current value of the vehicle

loan_amount_outstanding.description: the amount, if any, of a loan used to purchase the vehicle which is still left to pay

date_of_purchase.description: the date the car was purchased by the applicant

in_regular_use.description: Whether or not the vehicle is in regular use

assessment_id.description: The UUID of the assessment returned from the call to the assessment endpoint

vehicles.description: An array of objects describing the applicant's vehicles
